manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sevenat DIGITAL CAMERA Digital Camera for Photography and Video Your first versatile digital camera, 48 megapixels, 4K resolution, has an 8MP CMOS true color sensor and a 3-inch large 180° flip screen to capture details, letting you enjoy recording at home or travel! Choose the Resolution Image: 48M/ 44M/ 36M/ 24M/ 20M/16M... Video: 4K/ 2.7K/1080P FULL HD/720P HD... More features are waiting for you to unlock! 180° flip selfie, Flash, time-lapse(2/5/10S), Continuous shooting, slow motion, loop, face & smile detection, multiple filter options...

Digital Camera More Functions Camera with Flash & Anti-shake Digital camera with flash and anti-shake can make photos and videos clearer to record nights and sports! Digital Camera with 180° Flip Vlogging camera with flip screen 16x zoom can easily take selfies and long-distance photography! Digital Camera for Photography Continuous shooting of digital camera captures the many beautiful moments, and 3-inch large screen reflects real color!

DIGITAL CAMERA WITH AUTOFOCUS Digital Camera for Clearer Photos Digital camera for beginners uses advanced CMOS sensors and autofocus to capture clearer shots at both distance and close range. How to take clear photos? 1) Choose a bright light place. 2) Use the flash in the darker. 3) Half-press the shutter to autofocus-Focus frame chhanges from yellow to green-Quickly press the shutter to complete the shooting.

VLOGGING CAMERA FOR VIDEO Video Camera with Pause and Filters 4K Digital Camera: the recording process can be paused and resumed, re-shoot to save time, giving all play to your creativity! All Kinds of Filters: The choice of filter depends on the atmosphere and inspiration you want to create.

Portable Travel Camera Small sizes: 4.53×2.75×1.57 inch, fitting into bags. Lighter than a phone, 0.59 pounds without pressure! Simple Point and Shoot Camera Point and shoot digital cameras has face and smile capture function, making shooting simple and easy to use! 3" Large Screen Camera Digital camera comes with 32G SD card and rechargeable batteries, you don't have to worry about travel records!

4K VLOGGING CAMERA FOR I/O Download Photos and Videos To Computer: Use the mini USB cable to connect the computer, select "MSDC" and press OK! To Phone: Use Phone adapter to connect your phone! Note: Phone adapter not included: Everyone's phone is different, so everyone needs to have a corresponding adapter according to their needs.

Ideal Gift for Yourself, Families, Friends Digital Camera for Photography and Video Who is vlogging camera suitable for? It can be used by people over 6 years old. Whether it is adults, teens, seniors or beginners, and who have never used a camera, it is easy to use, easy to operate, and comes with a full range of functions. Is small camera suitable to carry and travel? Yes! The palm-sized 0.59lbs compact travel camera features a drop-resistant wrist strap to keep your hands free from soreness while shooting long hours, and it can also be kept in your small bag. (can bring it on the airplane) Warm Tips: 1.4K camera compatible with 4-128GB SD card, please format the SD card before use the camera first. 2.Please fully charge the battery before first time using this digital camera. 3.Make sure there is the SD card in the camera before use. Note: If you have any questions, you can click store to ask question or send Amazon message, we will answer you as soon as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and pictures are perfect
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this camera to replace an aging Canon which now takes unacceptable photos and is terrible in low light or if a subject is moving. This camera is an excellent replacement. Canon's are now many hundreds of dollars and this beauty was under one hundred. It takes perfect pictures, works well in low light, has a fill in light, large aperture, can switch from stills to videos instantly and also perform vlogging if I so desired. It comes with two batteries and the SD card is also ideal. It's exactly what I was looking for and at an excellent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: "I am genuinely thrilled with my recent purchase of this digital camera. From its sleek and compact design to its exceptional performance, this camera has truly exceeded my expectations.The image quality is outstanding, capturing vibrant colors and intricate details with precision. The advanced features, including various shooting modes and customizable settings, provide versatility for both amateur and experienced photographers alike. The low-light performance is particularly impressive, delivering sharp and clear images even in challenging conditions.The build quality is top-notch, exuding durability and craftsmanship. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip during extended shooting sessions. The intuitive user interface and user-friendly controls make navigating through menus a breeze, enhancing the overall user experience.One standout feature is the camera's connectivity options. The seamless integration with my smartphone allows for easy photo sharing and remote control, adding a modern touch to the photography experience. The battery life is commendable, providing ample power for a day of shooting without the constant need for recharging.The video capabilities are equally remarkable, capturing smooth and high-resolution footage. The autofocus system is fast and reliable, ensuring that I never miss a moment. This digital camera truly excels in versatility, whether I'm capturing stills or recording videos.The customer service experience was also noteworthy. Any inquiries were promptly addressed, reflecting the manufacturer's commitment to customer satisfaction. All in all, this digital camera has become an indispensable companion for capturing life's moments with clarity and style. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking a high-performance, feature-rich camera that delivers exceptional results across various shooting scenarios."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, first-class quality
reviews.reviewText: This high-quality camera is inexpensive, small and portable, and very simple to use. The battery life is also great, making it a worthwhile investment, and no doubt it will help you capture and create amazing content! Five star rating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall is happy with!
reviews.reviewText: We used it to take some photos for kids. Photos look good. It better than a phone photos. It has a foldout screen so we also can take selfies. It’s easy to use and pretty easily to transfer photos from camera to laptop. The camera comes with 2 batteries, USB cable and charger, 32gb memory card, a strap, lens cover and a small camera case/bag. We happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to operate, good price
reviews.reviewText: It is light, perfect for travel shots, the price is very reasonable. Easy to operate and the pictures are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and fun to use
reviews.reviewText: The camera looks cool and has good quality materials. The display looks high in pixels and looks good. I took some videos. The quality is good. Make sure you are always ready to capture the perfect shot. My very digital camera seamlessly combines features and style with a travel-size camera for content creators who demand excellence and value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this camera for a past few days and really enjoy it. It has good quality for an affordable price. The video quality isn’t the best but the camera with flash is really good in my opinion I would definitely recommend it if someone is looking for an affordable option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality
reviews.reviewText: Great picture quality. The batteries lasted a long time and the camera was perfect pocket size. The extra battery made a big difference. The flip out screen made selfies a lot easier. Glad I purchased this item.
